# ModalLite
```import { ModalLite, ModalHeader, ModalTitle, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Molecules";```

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-modallite--basic" />
</Preview>

there's props `backdrop` can define with value type string or boolean, example: `backdrop={true}` or `backdrop={'true'}`<br/>
if you're not use the props `backdrop`, that will return `true` by default
